text: Dibromoanthanthrone is a scarlet or orange-red-hue synthetic organic colourant. It is an anthraquinone derivative, first synthesized in 1913 as a vat dye, C.I. Vat Orange 3 (C.I. 59300), and later on also as a pigment, C.I. Pigment Red 168. ==References== Category:Anthraquinone dyes Category:Vat dyes Category:Organic pigments Category:Organobromides Category:Polycyclic aromatic compounds
title: Dibromoanthanthrone
